feed.title: OctoBot: Free open source trading robot
feed.subtitle: OctoBot is an open source cryptocurrency trading robot designed to be easy to use and infinitely customizable.

entry.title: The OctoBot Cloud is live
entry.content: Simply deploy your OctoBot on our cloud platform and enjoy it from anywhere at everytime.
entry.summary: Simply deploy your OctoBot on our cloud platform and enjoy it from anywhere at everytime.

entry.title: Follow trading strategies
entry.content: Subscribing to OctoBot Cloud strategies allows you to easily trade using a strategy made by someone else from the OctoBot community.
entry.summary: Subscribing to OctoBot Cloud strategies allows you to easily trade using a strategy made by someone else from the OctoBot community.

entry.title: Trading basics
entry.content: Trading cryptocurrencies can be exciting, but also takes a lot of time if you don’t know how to do it. There are many different types of orders you can use to buy or sell on your exchange according to what you want to do.
entry.summary: Trading cryptocurrencies can be exciting, but also takes a lot of time if you don’t know how to do it. There are many different types of orders you can use to buy or sell on your exchange according to what you want to do.
